page.title: 15 Summertown Shops Oxford
page.content: Summertown shops are frequently used by local people although shoppers visit Summertown from an average distance of up to four miles. In our survey most visitors liked to use Summertown shops as much as the City Centre. The most popular transport is the car followed by walking. Not many people cycled that day because it was wet weather. Although more people came to Summertown for certain items rather than a normal shopping spree, the main shops used were Gateway, Budgens, Centre News and the greengrocers. We calculated that an average person visits Summertown three times a week and spends approximately fifty minutes each time. A popular complaint was parking. In the early eighties the cars drove into a diagonal space;this caused accidents. It is now horizontal parking.
